name: Consolas RPG 2 [Alpha]
description:
Consolas RPG 2 is a sophisticated text RPG game where you play as a knight who must take on vicious enemies, gather valuable items and traverse the great landscape that is New Scotland.

If you have any suggestions or encounter any bugs and glitches, please tell me.

Don't forget to join my game dev server for sneak peaks & unreleased stuff (13+)
